keywords: can i apply for more later
bankFAQs.answer: Absolutely! Once your current loan is successfully repaid (or after 6 months of on-time EMI payments), you become eligible for a fresh, potentially higher loan. Your credit profile gets re-evaluated, and with a better repayment history, you're likely to receive a higher pre-approved limit next time. We reward good repayment behaviour!

If you miss an EMI, a late payment penalty of 2% per month on the overdue amount applies. We recommend setting up auto-debit to avoid this. If you're facing a genuine hardship, please call us â€” we have restructuring options for difficult situations.
